com.github.pidygb.gestureutilities

Class SwipeDismissViewListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.pidygb.gestureutilities.SwipeDismissViewListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    View.OnTouchListener

    public class SwipeDismissViewListener
extends Object
implements View.OnTouchListener
    A View.OnTouchListener and a RecyclerView.OnScrollListener that makes the list items in a RecyclerView dismissable.

    If a scroll listener and/or a touch listener are already assigned, the caller should still pass scroll and touch changes through to this listener. This will ensure that this SwipeDismissViewListener is paused during list view scrolling.

    Example usage:

     SwipeDismissViewListener swipeDismissViewTouchListener = new SwipeDismissViewListener(context,
              new SwipeDismissViewListener.OnSwipeDismissListener() {
                  public boolean canDismiss(View view) {
                      return true;
                  }

                  public void onDismissStart(View view) {
                      // do something
                  }

                  public void onDismissCancel(View view){
                      // do something
                  }

                  public void onDismissEnd(View view, boolean dismissRight){
                      // do something
                  }

               mView.setOnTouchListener(swipeDismissViewTouchListener);

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  SwipeDismissViewListener.OnSwipeDismissListener
      The callback interface used by SwipeDismissViewListener to inform its client about a successful dismissal of one or more list item positions.
